rawContent:
UK Transgender Predator sentenced to 9 years in prison for raping a vulnerable woman using ‘her penis.’ 

Lexi-Rose Crawford previously began identifying as a woman after being released from prison for raping a child. 

After coming out of prison and coming out as trans they then went on to commit another crime, the sexual assault of a woman. 

The formal court indictment referred to the rapist as using “her penis” to commit the crime and referred to him as a woman throughout the court case, despite being a biological man. 

He is expected to service his 9 year sentence in a men’s prison, unlike other transgender prisoners across the UK who are housed with women. 

Source: Daily Mail
